owl:Ontology.dct:title: Incident Response Ontology v2
owl:Ontology.dct:description: An ontology for modeling cybersecurity incident response processes
owl:Ontology.dct:creator: IRKB Team

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Incident
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A security incident that requires investigation and response

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Artefact
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Digital evidence or forensic artefacts collected during incident response

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Observable
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An observable piece of evidence in an investigation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Course of Action
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A planned response to a security incident

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Detection and Analysis
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Activities to identify and assess security incidents

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Containment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to limit the scope of an incident

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Eradication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to remove threats from affected systems

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Recovery
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Actions to restore systems to normal operation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Analyst
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A security analyst who investigates and responds to incidents

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Security Event
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An observable occurrence relevant to system security

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Security Analysis
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The examination of security events to understand incidents

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Responder Communication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Communication between incident responders during investigation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to related security events

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to related forensic artefacts

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has course of action
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to response actions taken

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has confirmation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The analyst who confirmed the incident

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COA creation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The analyst who created the course of action

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has COA assigned analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The analyst responsible for executing the course of action

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact creation analyst
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The analyst who collected or created the artefact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has observable
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links to observable pieces of evidence

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Links an incident to security analyses

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for an incident

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Human-readable name for an incident

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed description of an incident

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident severity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The severity level of an incident

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the incident record was created

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has confirmation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the incident was confirmed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has end datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When incident response concluded

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current status of the incident

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has incident stage
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current stage in incident lifecycle

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Classification of the artefact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact data value
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The actual content or value of the artefact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has artefact creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the artefact was created or collected

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has data type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of observable data

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has data
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The actual observable data

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Narrative description of the course of action

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current execution status of the course of action

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA creation datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the course of action was created

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA start datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the course of action was initiated

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has COA end datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the course of action was completed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has analyst ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for an analyst

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has analyst email
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Email address of the analyst

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for a security event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed description of a security event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event activity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the activity within a security event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has event activity datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the security event occurred

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of analysis performed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis data value
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The data value resulting from analysis

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis datetime
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: When the security analysis was performed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has security analysis details
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Detailed findings from the analysis

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has analysis report
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The full report from analyzing an observable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was generated by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the security event that generated this analysis

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: was performed by
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the analyst who performed this activity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: used
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a course of action used specific analysis
